AttackerCapabilities: Ability to perform HTTP requests using curl
Understanding of path traversal and remote code execution

Vulnerabilities: Apache httpd 2.4.49 remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2021-42013)

Steps.Description: Exploit the path traversal vulnerability to access sensitive files on the server.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that by exploiting the path traversal vulnerability, they can access the flag.png file located in the ../secret/safe/ directory.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker crafts an HTTP request using curl to access the file by traversing back directories and retrieving its contents.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully retrieves the contents of the flag.png file and encodes it as base64.
